name: Son of Fenris
description: The Son of Fenris is a Huge monstrosity with an impressive physique, embodying chaos and evil. Its powerful build is accentuated by a terrifying presence and chaotic nature, enhanced by truesight and tremorsense.
memorable: Its ability to swallow opponents while dealing significant necrotic or radiant damage makes it particularly feared, along with its powerful acidic breath attack.
goals: To dominate and instill fear in those it encounters, often leading chaotic attacks against adventurers.
relations: As a monstrosity, it may be related to other chaotic beasts or serve a higher chaotic evil power.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic environments, often amidst ruins or cursed lands.
strengths: Immunity to cold and poison, resistance to necrotic and radiant damage, and significant melee damage output.
attacks: Wields powerful melee attacks with a Bite and Slam, alongside a ranged Divine Bolt attack, and a devastating Snake Breath ability.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to swallow creatures, rendering them blinded and restrained while inflicting continuous acid damage.
senses: Possesses truesight and tremorsense, allowing it to detect hidden foes and sense vibrations around it.
skills: Excels in Religion, showcasing exceptional knowledge and understanding in that area.
additional_information: Has advantage on Wisdom checks related to hearing and smell.
Weapon attacks deal an extra 3d6 necrotic or radiant damage.
Utilizes both melee and ranged attacks effectively.
Chaos may lead to unpredictable combat outcomes.
spellcasting: Features ranged spell-like abilities that deal necrotic or radiant damage.
test_queries: huge chaotic evil monster with necrotic attacks
powerful monster that can swallow its foes
fearsome creature with poison breath attack
